name: The Collector
tooltip:
The Collector

Cost: 3000
+55 Attack Damage

+12 Lethality (7.47 − 12 (based on level) armor penetration)

UNIQUE Passive - Death and Taxes: If you deal post-mitigation damage that would leave an enemy (except epic monsters and structures) below 5% of their maximum health, execute them. Champion kills grant you an additional 25.
